reviews.review: jogo sensacional ,  so acho que a valve melhore  quiisito de banir hacks mais rapido

This game is some next lvl garbage, a fortnite wannabe trash, CSGOs creators are a bunch of dickweeds, the fact that I'm still til this day cheating with silent aim 360 aimbot is fucking baffling. Everytime I play this game I feel good for the youth of Africa, because they will never have to experience or go through this disaster and pure cancer of a game. Thank god for that.
